title: The Triangle E5 - Castaways
description:
The team has survived the bizarro-world Russians, but it turns out there is more than one unfriendly neighbor on the island. 

Episode written by Mindy McGinnis.

For more shows like this, visit Realm.fm, and sign up for our newsletter while you're there!
